title: 大部分玩家无法登陆
author: Wordpyc
txt_content:
登陆会显示主机中断了一个远程链接
后台会跳出这个错误
[size=0.8][14:07:44 INFO]: huo lost connection: Internal server error[size=0.8][14:07:44 INFO]: [size=0.8]huo Left the game.[size=0.8][size=0.8][14:07:44 WARN]: [Essentials] Task #100 for Essentials v2.17.1.56 generated an exception[size=0.8]java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/earth2me/essentials/xmpp/XMPPManager[size=0.8]at com.earth2me.essentials.xmpp.EssentialsXMPP.updatePresence(EssentialsXMPP.java:123) ~[?:?][size=0.8]at com.earth2me.essentials.xmpp.EssentialsXMPPPlayerListener$2.run(EssentialsXMPPPlayerListener.java:59) ~[?:?][size=0.8]at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:77) ~[CraftTask.class:c04ca15][size=0.8]at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:421) [CraftScheduler.class:c04ca15][size=0.8]at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:836) [MinecraftServer.class:?][size=0.8]at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:469) [nz.class:?][size=0.8]at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:778) [MinecraftServer.class:?][size=0.8]at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:621) [MinecraftServer.class:?][size=0.8]at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) [?:1.8.0_241][size=0.8] [size=0.8]求大佬帮看看，谢谢了版本1.12.2

replies.author: 小张up
replies.txt_content:
Wordpyc 发表于 2020-2-17 15:06
大佬请问这个插件的作用是啥？
要我说，就是报错用的。。。。
【好像是获取玩家所在地？】
求最佳

replies.author: Gently_Lord
replies.txt_content:
区块错误
尝试开服后把玩家的的信息删除
玩家信息在world/player/玩家ID的.da t删除

replies.author: AD【钙奶】
replies.txt_content:
服务器文件夹中找到forge.cfg
然后将
removeErroringEntities=false
removeErroringTileEntities=false
改为
removeErroringEntities=true
removeErroringTileEntities=true
